name: Wizard Ball
description:
Two-player Soccer/Airhockey with spells.

Keyboard player 1

  • Move: A & D
  • Aim: N & M
  • Spell/Detonate: Space
  • Defense Spell/Place: F
  • Pause: Escape

Keyboard player 2

  • Move: Left & Right
  • Aim: Numpad 2 & Numpad 3
  • Spell/Detonate:  Numpad 0
  • Defense Spell/Place:  Numpad 1
  • Pause: Numpad -

360 Controller (player1/player2)

  • Move: LT & RT
  • Aim: Left Stick
  • Spell/Detonate: A
  • Defense Spell/Place: B
  • Pause: Start

Music by: Taktfastur Profastur
